For in the <S%H8083>eighth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign,<s%> while he was <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H5288>young,<s%> he <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> after the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> and in the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> he <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H2891>purge<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> from the <S%H1116>high<s%> places, and the <S%H842>groves,<s%> and the <S%H6456>carved<s%> images, and the <S%H4541>molten<s%> images.

And they <S%H5422>broke<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4196>altars<s%> of <S%H1168>Baalim<s%> in his <S%H6440>presence;<s%> and the <S%H2553>images,<s%> that were on <S%H4605>high<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> them, he <S%H1438>cut<s%> <S%H1438>down;<s%> and the <S%H842>groves,<s%> and the <S%H6456>carved<s%> images, and the <S%H4541>molten<s%> images, he <S%H7665>broke<s%> in pieces, and made <S%H1854>dust<s%> of them, and <S%H2236>strewed<s%> it on the <S%H6913>graves<s%> of them that had <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> to them.
And he <S%H8313>burnt<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> on their <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Now in the <S%H6240>eighteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign,<s%> when he had <S%H2891>purged<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house,<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H683>Azaliah,<s%> and <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H8269>governor<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3098>Joah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3098>Joahaz<s%> the <S%H2142>recorder,<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God.<s%>

And when they <S%H3318>brought<s%> out the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> given by <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law,<s%> that he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes.<s%>

<S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for me, and for them that are <S%H7604>left<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> that is <S%H4672>found:<s%> for <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that is <S%H5413>poured<s%> out on us, <S%H3282>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> our <S%H1>fathers<s%> have not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> after <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof, even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H423>curses<s%> that are <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H7121>read<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%>

<S%H8478>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and have <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> that they might provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands;<s%> therefore my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> shall be <S%H5413>poured<s%> out on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and shall not be <S%H3518>quenched.<s%>

<S%H3282>Because<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> was <S%H7401>tender,<s%> and you did <S%H3665>humble<s%> yourself <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> when you <S%H8085>heard<s%> his <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> thereof, and <S%H3665>humbled<s%> yourself <S%H6440>before<s%> me, and did <S%H7167>rend<s%> your <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me; I have even <S%H8085>heard<s%> you <S%H1571>also,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H622>gather<s%> you to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and you shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to your <S%H6913>grave<s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I will <S%H935>bring<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the same.
